title: PURE’s Oveedia Transition’s to Rackspace
text:
LAS VEGAS, September. 14, 2015 /PRBuzz/ -- Pure Hospitality Solutions, Inc. , (OTC: PNOW ) announced today, that the Company After a successful hosting relationship with Amazon Web Services, Pure Hospitality has decided to transition Oveedia over to Rackspace, in support of the Central American-Caribbean travel hub’s upcoming beta testing.
Rackspace , a multi-billion dollar company traded on the New York Stock Exchange [ RAX ], has been widely accepted as one of the most technically advanced server and hosting solutions companies in the world. Based in Windcrest, Texas, Rackspace has offices and locations in Australia, California, the UK, Switzerland, Israel, the Netherlands, India and Hong Kong.
As Oveedia transition’s to Rackspace, Pure Hospitality has joined the ranks of many Fortune 500 companies who entrust their websites and data solutions with the server giant. Oveedia’s dual database platform will now be hosted on dedicated servers, as well as backup servers, across Rackspace’s global infrastructure. This transition comes at a pivotal time, as Pure prepares to launch an official beta test of Oveedia’s platform.
Oveedia, which has been slowly introduced via screen shots of the software and source code , is projected to be the Tourism Hub for all of Central America and the Caribbean. Aside from Sabre’s listing of 125,000 hotels, 400 airlines, 16 cruise lines and 25 car rental selections, Oveedia has already signed exclusive relationships with the Tango Mar , Guarumo , Samasati and the Playa Escondida Lodge , with many others preparing to join Oveedia.
As Oveedia transition’s to Rackspace, the software developers at Softon ITG are extremely busy behind the scenes, preparing for a seamless launch of the platform. Softon’s management has confirmed that Oveedia is nearly complete and will be officially ready in 20 days, for PURE to begin beta testing at its leisure. Pure Hospitality has confirmed that with Oveedia’s transition to Rackspace, the Company is wrapping up some brief loose ends, in preparation for a global launch of the Oveedia platform.
About Pure Hospitality Solutions, Inc.
PURE provides proprietary technology, marketing solutions and branding services to hotel operators and condominium owners. The Company's vision is to build competitive operations in the areas of (i) online marketing and hotel internet booking engine services,
(ii) hotel branding and, (iii) own, operate and in some instances develop, boutique hotels under the new, "by PURE" brand.
